data.name: Cattails: Wildwood Story - Pet Molbert
data.detailed_description:
A cantankerous little mole with an excellent nose. Molbert is accustomed to the dark places of the world.

Molbert’s keen sense of smell is a great benefit when mining. If there are unearthed diamonds nearby, Molbert may detect them and attempt to notify you.

This special pet is a pre-release exclusive item that will not be made available after the game launches.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12.0 Monterey
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
